mapper.insert: insert into member (user_id, user_password, user_email, user_name, user_birth, user_phone, join_date) values (#{id}, #{password}, #{email}, #{name}, #{birth}, #{phone}, now())
mapper.select: select * from member where user_id in (select f.friend_id from member m inner join friend f on (m.user_id = f.user_id) where m.user_id = #{id} and status = 1)
select * from member m inner join friend f on (m.user_id = f.user_id) where f.friend_id = #{id} and status = 0
mapper.insert: insert into friend(user_id, friend_id, status) value(#{id}, #{friend}, #{status})
